full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA BKRA SHIS BRTZEGS PA'I GA-YANG 'GUG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES PA 'DI NI DGE SEMS STOBS NAS 'BYUNG BA DPAL PHUN SUM TSOGS 'PHAGS PA BKRA SHIS BRTZEGS PA @005A GA-YANG GUGS 'DI'I PHAN YON NI, GTZO BO BKRA MI SHIS PA, 'BRING BKRA MI SHIS PA, GSON GSHIN GNYIS KYI BKRA MI SHIS PA LA SOGS THAMS CAD RAB TU ZHI BAR 'GYUR RO, ,GRANGS LAS 'DAS PA DPAG TU MED PA'I BKRA SHIS KYI SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SEMS CAN DON DU BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI BKA' MCHOG PO LAS SPYI BOS BRTEN TE BZHUGS LAS BTUS PAR BYA'O,, ,,)
